00062 typedef struct {
00063     DerivedMesh *dm;
00064     Object *ob;
00065     int pos;
00066 } VertexIt;
00067 
00073 static void VertexIt_Destruct(CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor * iterator)
00074 {
00075     if (iterator->it) {
00076         // deallocate memory for iterator
00077         MEM_freeN(iterator->it);
00078         iterator->it = 0;
00079     }
00080     iterator->Done = NULL;
00081     iterator->Fill = NULL;
00082     iterator->Reset = NULL;
00083     iterator->Step = NULL;
00084     iterator->num_elements = 0;
00085 
00086 }       
00087 
00088 static int VertexIt_Done(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00089 {
00090     VertexIt * iterator = (VertexIt *)it;
00091     return(iterator->pos >= iterator->dm->getNumVerts(iterator->dm));
00092 }
00093 
00094 static void VertexIt_Fill(CSG_IteratorPtr it, CSG_IVertex *vert)
00095 {
00096     VertexIt * iterator = (VertexIt *)it;
00097     MVert *verts = iterator->dm->getVertArray(iterator->dm);
00098 
00099     float global_pos[3];
00100 
00101     /* boolean happens in global space, transform both with obmat */
00102     mul_v3_m4v3(
00103         global_pos,
00104         iterator->ob->obmat, 
00105         verts[iterator->pos].co
00106     );
00107 
00108     vert->position[0] = global_pos[0];
00109     vert->position[1] = global_pos[1];
00110     vert->position[2] = global_pos[2];
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void VertexIt_Step(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00114 {
00115     VertexIt * iterator = (VertexIt *)it;
00116     iterator->pos ++;
00117 } 
00118  
00119 static void VertexIt_Reset(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00120 {
00121     VertexIt * iterator = (VertexIt *)it;
00122     iterator->pos = 0;
00123 }
00124 
00125 static void VertexIt_Construct(CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor *output, DerivedMesh *dm, Object *ob)
00126 {
00127 
00128     VertexIt *it;
00129     if (output == 0) return;
00130 
00131     // allocate some memory for blender iterator
00132     it = (VertexIt *)(MEM_mallocN(sizeof(VertexIt),"Boolean_VIt"));
00133     if (it == 0) {
00134         return;
00135     }
00136     // assign blender specific variables
00137     it->dm = dm;
00138     it->ob = ob; // needed for obmat transformations 
00139     
00140     it->pos = 0;
00141 
00142      // assign iterator function pointers.
00143     output->Step = VertexIt_Step;
00144     output->Fill = VertexIt_Fill;
00145     output->Done = VertexIt_Done;
00146     output->Reset = VertexIt_Reset;
00147     output->num_elements = it->dm->getNumVerts(it->dm);
00148     output->it = it;
00149 }

00155 typedef struct {
00156     DerivedMesh *dm;
00157     int pos;
00158     int offset;
00159     int flip;
00160 } FaceIt;
00161 
00162 static void FaceIt_Destruct(CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor * iterator)
00163 {
00164     MEM_freeN(iterator->it);
00165     iterator->Done = NULL;
00166     iterator->Fill = NULL;
00167     iterator->Reset = NULL;
00168     iterator->Step = NULL;
00169     iterator->num_elements = 0;
00170 }
00171 
00172 static int FaceIt_Done(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00173 {
00174     // assume CSG_IteratorPtr is of the correct type.
00175     FaceIt * iterator = (FaceIt *)it;
00176     return(iterator->pos >= iterator->dm->getNumTessFaces(iterator->dm));
00177 }
00178 
00179 static void FaceIt_Fill(CSG_IteratorPtr it, CSG_IFace *face)
00180 {
00181     // assume CSG_IteratorPtr is of the correct type.
00182     FaceIt *face_it = (FaceIt *)it;
00183     MFace *mfaces = face_it->dm->getTessFaceArray(face_it->dm);
00184     MFace *mface = &mfaces[face_it->pos];
00185 
00186     /* reverse face vertices if necessary */
00187     face->vertex_index[1] = mface->v2;
00188     if ( face_it->flip == 0 ) {
00189     face->vertex_index[0] = mface->v1;
00190     face->vertex_index[2] = mface->v3;
00191     }
00192     else {
00193         face->vertex_index[2] = mface->v1;
00194         face->vertex_index[0] = mface->v3;
00195     }
00196     if (mface->v4) {
00197         face->vertex_index[3] = mface->v4;
00198         face->vertex_number = 4;
00199     }
00200     else {
00201         face->vertex_number = 3;
00202     }
00203 
00204     face->orig_face = face_it->offset + face_it->pos;
00205 }
00206 
00207 static void FaceIt_Step(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00208 {
00209     FaceIt * face_it = (FaceIt *)it;        
00210     face_it->pos ++;
00211 }
00212 
00213 static void FaceIt_Reset(CSG_IteratorPtr it)
00214 {
00215     FaceIt * face_it = (FaceIt *)it;        
00216     face_it->pos = 0;
00217 }   
00218 
00219 static void FaceIt_Construct(
00220     CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor *output, DerivedMesh *dm, int offset, Object *ob)
00221 {
00222     FaceIt *it;
00223     if (output == 0) return;
00224 
00225     // allocate some memory for blender iterator
00226     it = (FaceIt *)(MEM_mallocN(sizeof(FaceIt),"Boolean_FIt"));
00227     if (it == 0) {
00228         return;
00229     }
00230     // assign blender specific variables
00231     it->dm = dm;
00232     it->offset = offset;
00233     it->pos = 0;
00234 
00235     /* determine if we will need to reverse order of face vertices */
00236     if (ob->size[0] < 0.0f) {
00237         if (ob->size[1] < 0.0f && ob->size[2] < 0.0f) {
00238             it->flip = 1;
00239         }
00240         else if (ob->size[1] >= 0.0f && ob->size[2] >= 0.0f) {
00241             it->flip = 1;
00242         }
00243         else {
00244             it->flip = 0;
00245         }
00246     }
00247     else {
00248         if (ob->size[1] < 0.0f && ob->size[2] < 0.0f) {
00249             it->flip = 0;
00250         }
00251         else if (ob->size[1] >= 0.0f && ob->size[2] >= 0.0f) {
00252             it->flip = 0;
00253         }
00254         else {
00255             it->flip = 1;
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     // assign iterator function pointers.
00260     output->Step = FaceIt_Step;
00261     output->Fill = FaceIt_Fill;
00262     output->Done = FaceIt_Done;
00263     output->Reset = FaceIt_Reset;
00264     output->num_elements = it->dm->getNumTessFaces(it->dm);
00265     output->it = it;
00266 }
00267 
00268 static Object *AddNewBlenderMesh(Scene *scene, Base *base)
00269 {
00270     // This little function adds a new mesh object to the blender object list
00271     // It uses ob to duplicate data as this seems to be easier than creating
00272     // a new one. This new oject contains no faces nor vertices.
00273     Mesh *old_me;
00274     Base *basen;
00275     Object *ob_new;
00276 
00277     // now create a new blender object.
00278     // duplicating all the settings from the previous object
00279     // to the new one.
00280     ob_new= copy_object(base->object);
00281 
00282     // Ok we don't want to use the actual data from the
00283     // last object, the above function incremented the 
00284     // number of users, so decrement it here.
00285     old_me= ob_new->data;
00286     old_me->id.us--;
00287 
00288     // Now create a new base to add into the linked list of 
00289     // vase objects.
00290     
00291     basen= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(Base), "duplibase");
00292     *basen= *base;
00293     BLI_addhead(&scene->base, basen);   /* addhead: anders oneindige lus */
00294     basen->object= ob_new;
00295     basen->flag &= ~SELECT;
00296                 
00297     // Initialize the mesh data associated with this object.                        
00298     ob_new->data= add_mesh("Mesh");
00299 
00300     // Finally assign the object type.
00301     ob_new->type= OB_MESH;
00302 
00303     return ob_new;
00304 }
00305 
00306 static void InterpCSGFace(
00307     DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *orig_dm, int index, int orig_index, int nr,
00308     float mapmat[][4])
00309 {
00310     float obco[3], *co[4], *orig_co[4], w[4][4];
00311     MFace *mface, *orig_mface;
00312     int j;
00313 
00314     mface = CDDM_get_tessface(dm, index);
00315     orig_mface = orig_dm->getTessFaceArray(orig_dm) + orig_index;
00316 
00317     // get the vertex coordinates from the original mesh
00318     orig_co[0] = (orig_dm->getVertArray(orig_dm) + orig_mface->v1)->co;
00319     orig_co[1] = (orig_dm->getVertArray(orig_dm) + orig_mface->v2)->co;
00320     orig_co[2] = (orig_dm->getVertArray(orig_dm) + orig_mface->v3)->co;
00321     orig_co[3] = (orig_mface->v4)? (orig_dm->getVertArray(orig_dm) + orig_mface->v4)->co: NULL;
00322 
00323     // get the vertex coordinates from the new derivedmesh
00324     co[0] = CDDM_get_vert(dm, mface->v1)->co;
00325     co[1] = CDDM_get_vert(dm, mface->v2)->co;
00326     co[2] = CDDM_get_vert(dm, mface->v3)->co;
00327     co[3] = (nr == 4)? CDDM_get_vert(dm, mface->v4)->co: NULL;
00328 
00329     for (j = 0; j < nr; j++) {
00330         // get coordinate into the space of the original mesh
00331         if (mapmat)
00332             mul_v3_m4v3(obco, mapmat, co[j]);
00333         else
00334             copy_v3_v3(obco, co[j]);
00335 
00336         interp_weights_face_v3( w[j],orig_co[0], orig_co[1], orig_co[2], orig_co[3], obco);
00337     }
00338 
00339     CustomData_interp(&orig_dm->faceData, &dm->faceData, &orig_index, NULL, (float*)w, 1, index);
00340 }
00341 
00342 /* Iterate over the CSG Output Descriptors and create a new DerivedMesh
00343  * from them */
00344 static DerivedMesh *ConvertCSGDescriptorsToDerivedMesh(
00345     CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor *face_it,
00346     CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor *vertex_it,
00347     float parinv[][4],
00348     float mapmat[][4],
00349     Material **mat,
00350     int *totmat,
00351     DerivedMesh *dm1,
00352     Object *ob1,
00353     DerivedMesh *dm2,
00354     Object *ob2)
00355 {
00356     DerivedMesh *result, *orig_dm;
00357     GHash *material_hash = NULL;
00358     Mesh *me1= (Mesh*)ob1->data;
00359     Mesh *me2= (Mesh*)ob2->data;
00360     int i, *origindex_layer;
00361 
00362     // create a new DerivedMesh
00363     result = CDDM_new(vertex_it->num_elements, 0, face_it->num_elements, 0, 0);
00364     CustomData_merge(&dm1->faceData, &result->faceData, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH & ~(CD_MASK_NORMAL | CD_MASK_POLYINDEX | CD_MASK_ORIGINDEX),
00365                       CD_DEFAULT, face_it->num_elements); 
00366     CustomData_merge(&dm2->faceData, &result->faceData, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH & ~(CD_MASK_NORMAL | CD_MASK_POLYINDEX | CD_MASK_ORIGINDEX),
00367                       CD_DEFAULT, face_it->num_elements); 
00368 
00369     // step through the vertex iterators:
00370     for (i = 0; !vertex_it->Done(vertex_it->it); i++) {
00371         CSG_IVertex csgvert;
00372         MVert *mvert = CDDM_get_vert(result, i);
00373 
00374         // retrieve a csg vertex from the boolean module
00375         vertex_it->Fill(vertex_it->it, &csgvert);
00376         vertex_it->Step(vertex_it->it);
00377 
00378         // we have to map the vertex coordinates back in the coordinate frame
00379         // of the resulting object, since it was computed in world space
00380         mul_v3_m4v3(mvert->co, parinv, csgvert.position);
00381     }
00382 
00383     // a hash table to remap materials to indices
00384     material_hash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "CSG_mat gh");
00385 
00386     if (mat)
00387         *totmat = 0;
00388 
00389     origindex_layer = result->getTessFaceDataArray(result, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00390 
00391     // step through the face iterators
00392     for (i = 0; !face_it->Done(face_it->it); i++) {
00393         Mesh *orig_me;
00394         Object *orig_ob;
00395         Material *orig_mat;
00396         CSG_IFace csgface;
00397         MFace *mface;
00398         int orig_index, mat_nr;
00399 
00400         // retrieve a csg face from the boolean module
00401         face_it->Fill(face_it->it, &csgface);
00402         face_it->Step(face_it->it);
00403 
00404         // find the original mesh and data
00405         orig_ob = (csgface.orig_face < dm1->getNumTessFaces(dm1))? ob1: ob2;
00406         orig_dm = (csgface.orig_face < dm1->getNumTessFaces(dm1))? dm1: dm2;
00407         orig_me = (orig_ob == ob1)? me1: me2;
00408         orig_index = (orig_ob == ob1)? csgface.orig_face: csgface.orig_face - dm1->getNumTessFaces(dm1);
00409 
00410         // copy all face layers, including mface
00411         CustomData_copy_data(&orig_dm->faceData, &result->faceData, orig_index, i, 1);
00412 
00413         // set mface
00414         mface = CDDM_get_tessface(result, i);
00415         mface->v1 = csgface.vertex_index[0];
00416         mface->v2 = csgface.vertex_index[1];
00417         mface->v3 = csgface.vertex_index[2];
00418         mface->v4 = (csgface.vertex_number == 4)? csgface.vertex_index[3]: 0;
00419 
00420         // set material, based on lookup in hash table
00421         orig_mat = give_current_material(orig_ob, mface->mat_nr + 1);
00422 
00423         if (mat && orig_mat) {
00424             if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(material_hash, orig_mat)) {
00425                 mat[*totmat] = orig_mat;
00426                 mat_nr = mface->mat_nr = (*totmat)++;
00427                 BLI_ghash_insert(material_hash, orig_mat, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(mat_nr));
00428             }
00429             else
00430                 mface->mat_nr = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(material_hash, orig_mat));
00431         }
00432         else if (orig_mat) {
00433             if (orig_ob == ob1) {
00434                 // No need to change materian index for faces from left operand
00435             }
00436             else {
00437                 // for faces from right operand checn if there's needed material in left operand and if it is,
00438                 // use index of that material, otherwise fallback to first material (material with index=0)
00439                 if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(material_hash, orig_mat)) {
00440                     int a;
00441 
00442                     mat_nr = 0;
00443                     for (a = 0; a < ob1->totcol; a++) {
00444                         if (give_current_material(ob1, a+1) == orig_mat) {
00445                             mat_nr = a;
00446                             break;
00447                         }
00448                     }
00449 
00450                     BLI_ghash_insert(material_hash, orig_mat, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(mat_nr));
00451 
00452                     mface->mat_nr = mat_nr;
00453                 }
00454                 else
00455                     mface->mat_nr = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(material_hash, orig_mat));
00456             }
00457         }
00458         else
00459             mface->mat_nr = 0;
00460 
00461         InterpCSGFace(result, orig_dm, i, orig_index, csgface.vertex_number,
00462                       (orig_me == me2)? mapmat: NULL);
00463 
00464         test_index_face(mface, &result->faceData, i, csgface.vertex_number);
00465 
00466         if (origindex_layer && orig_ob == ob2)
00467             origindex_layer[i] = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00468     }
00469 
00470     if (material_hash)
00471         BLI_ghash_free(material_hash, NULL, NULL);
00472 
00473     CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(result);
00474 
00475     CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(result); /*builds ngon faces from tess (mface) faces*/
00476 
00477     /* this fixes shading issues but SHOULD NOT.
00478      * TODO, find out why face normals are wrong & flicker - campbell */
00479 #if 0
00480     DM_debug_print(result);
00481 
00482     CustomData_free(&result->faceData, result->numTessFaceData);
00483     result->numTessFaceData = 0;
00484     DM_ensure_tessface(result);
00485 #endif
00486 
00487     CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00488 
00489     return result;
00490 }
00491     
00492 static void BuildMeshDescriptors(
00493     struct DerivedMesh *dm,
00494     struct Object *ob,
00495     int face_offset,
00496     struct CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor * face_it,
00497     struct CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor * vertex_it)
00498 {
00499     VertexIt_Construct(vertex_it,dm, ob);
00500     FaceIt_Construct(face_it,dm,face_offset,ob);
00501 }
00502     
00503 static void FreeMeshDescriptors(
00504     struct CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor *face_it,
00505     struct CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor *vertex_it)
00506 {
00507     VertexIt_Destruct(vertex_it);
00508     FaceIt_Destruct(face_it);
00509 }
00510 
00511 static DerivedMesh *NewBooleanDerivedMesh_intern(
00512     DerivedMesh *dm, struct Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm_select, struct Object *ob_select,
00513     int int_op_type, Material **mat, int *totmat)
00514 {
00515 
00516     float inv_mat[4][4];
00517     float map_mat[4][4];
00518 
00519     DerivedMesh *result = NULL;
00520 
00521     if (dm == NULL || dm_select == NULL) return 0;
00522     if (!dm->getNumTessFaces(dm) || !dm_select->getNumTessFaces(dm_select)) return 0;
00523 
00524     // we map the final object back into ob's local coordinate space. For this
00525     // we need to compute the inverse transform from global to ob (inv_mat),
00526     // and the transform from ob to ob_select for use in interpolation (map_mat)
00527     invert_m4_m4(inv_mat, ob->obmat);
00528     mult_m4_m4m4(map_mat, inv_mat, ob_select->obmat);
00529     invert_m4_m4(inv_mat, ob_select->obmat);
00530 
00531     {
00532         // interface with the boolean module:
00533         //
00534         // the idea is, we pass the boolean module verts and faces using the
00535         // provided descriptors. once the boolean operation is performed, we
00536         // get back output descriptors, from which we then build a DerivedMesh
00537 
00538         CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor vd_1, vd_2;
00539         CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor fd_1, fd_2;
00540         CSG_OperationType op_type;
00541         CSG_BooleanOperation *bool_op;
00542 
00543         // work out the operation they chose and pick the appropriate 
00544         // enum from the csg module.
00545         switch (int_op_type) {
00546             case 1 : op_type = e_csg_intersection; break;
00547             case 2 : op_type = e_csg_union; break;
00548             case 3 : op_type = e_csg_difference; break;
00549             case 4 : op_type = e_csg_classify; break;
00550             default : op_type = e_csg_intersection;
00551         }
00552         
00553         BuildMeshDescriptors(dm_select, ob_select, 0, &fd_1, &vd_1);
00554         BuildMeshDescriptors(dm, ob, dm_select->getNumTessFaces(dm_select) , &fd_2, &vd_2);
00555 
00556         bool_op = CSG_NewBooleanFunction();
00557 
00558         // perform the operation
00559         if (CSG_PerformBooleanOperation(bool_op, op_type, fd_1, vd_1, fd_2, vd_2)) {
00560             CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor vd_o;
00561             CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor fd_o;
00562 
00563             CSG_OutputFaceDescriptor(bool_op, &fd_o);
00564             CSG_OutputVertexDescriptor(bool_op, &vd_o);
00565 
00566             // iterate through results of operation and insert
00567             // into new object
00568             result = ConvertCSGDescriptorsToDerivedMesh(
00569                 &fd_o, &vd_o, inv_mat, map_mat, mat, totmat, dm_select, ob_select, dm, ob);
00570 
00571             // free up the memory
00572             CSG_FreeVertexDescriptor(&vd_o);
00573             CSG_FreeFaceDescriptor(&fd_o);
00574         }
00575         else
00576             printf("Unknown internal error in boolean\n");
00577 
00578         CSG_FreeBooleanOperation(bool_op);
00579 
00580         FreeMeshDescriptors(&fd_1, &vd_1);
00581         FreeMeshDescriptors(&fd_2, &vd_2);
00582     }
00583 
00584     return result;
00585 }
00586 
00587 int NewBooleanMesh(Scene *scene, Base *base, Base *base_select, int int_op_type)
00588 {
00589     Mesh *me_new;
00590     int a, maxmat, totmat= 0;
00591     Object *ob_new, *ob, *ob_select;
00592     Material **mat;
00593     DerivedMesh *result;
00594     DerivedMesh *dm_select;
00595     DerivedMesh *dm;
00596 
00597     ob= base->object;
00598     ob_select= base_select->object;
00599 
00600     dm = mesh_get_derived_final(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00601     dm_select = mesh_create_derived_view(scene, ob_select, 0); // no modifiers in editmode ??
00602 
00603     maxmat= ob->totcol + ob_select->totcol;
00604     mat= (Material**)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(Material*)*maxmat, "NewBooleanMeshMat");
00605     
00606     /* put some checks in for nice user feedback */
00607     if (dm == NULL || dm_select == NULL) {
00608         return 0;
00609     }
00610 
00611     if (!dm->getNumTessFaces(dm) || !dm_select->getNumTessFaces(dm_select)) {
00612         MEM_freeN(mat);
00613         return -1;
00614     }
00615     
00616     result= NewBooleanDerivedMesh_intern(dm, ob, dm_select, ob_select, int_op_type, mat, &totmat);
00617 
00618     if (result == NULL) {
00619         MEM_freeN(mat);
00620         return 0;
00621     }
00622 
00623     /* create a new blender mesh object - using 'base' as  a template */
00624     ob_new= AddNewBlenderMesh(scene, base_select);
00625     me_new= ob_new->data;
00626 
00627     DM_to_mesh(result, me_new, ob_new);
00628     result->release(result);
00629 
00630     dm->release(dm);
00631     dm_select->release(dm_select);
00632 
00633     /* add materials to object */
00634     for (a = 0; a < totmat; a++)
00635         assign_material(ob_new, mat[a], a+1);
00636 
00637     MEM_freeN(mat);
00638 
00639     /* update dag */
00640     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_new->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00641 
00642     return 1;
00643 }
00644 
00645 DerivedMesh *NewBooleanDerivedMesh(DerivedMesh *dm, struct Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm_select, struct Object *ob_select,
00646                                    int int_op_type)
00647 {
00648     return NewBooleanDerivedMesh_intern(dm, ob, dm_select, ob_select, int_op_type, NULL, NULL);
00649 }
